title: Calendars Automatically Disabling
content:
I have two CalDAV calendars on my Synology Drive. Whenever the Synology drive is doing other tasks and Thunderbird is symultaneously trying to update the calendars, the following will consistently occur:

1) A small error next to the calendar will appear stating the calendar is momentarily unavailable. 2) If the Synology continues to be busy, the calendar will automatically disable and a button will appear next to the calendar to enable it. All appointments and tasks are removed from the calendar and task windows/tabs.

If step 2 occurs, the calendar will not re-enable automatically. It will remain disabled until the user manually re-enables it. This risks tasks and appointments being missed.

I regard this as a bug. A serious one. Is there a solution that I have not yet found despite looking everywhere?
creator: rhys.perrin

title: Thunderbird repatedly asking login to deleted gmail
content:
After deleting/removing a gmail account Thunderbird gets stuck in a loop constantly requesting that I login into that non-existing account.

The only solution I found was from over 2 years ago suggesting that we manually find and remove some random files, which also caused me to have to re-login into all of the existing accounts.

I feel like adding and removing accounts is a basic functionality for email apps. How has this not been fixed in over 2 years??

And why does it even remember removed accounts? If I remove it from the list of accounts I expect Thunderbird to delete all mentions of it from my system.
creator: zoran.ravic

title: Tag is gone once I click other emails or any button
content:
Hi.

I have two accounts on Thunderbird (the latest version up to 2024/12/8). One is Outlook and the other is via IMAP. I find tag function works well in any email of the Outlook account. But for my IMAP account, once I tag any email, it soon disappears after any further operation (e.g., clicking any button). What happened here? Is there any way to fix it?
creator: mingjia.xie

title: Sending and Forwarding emails has become very slow or not working
content:
Somewhere in between the latest Thunderbird update and me switching broadband providers from Virgin to Sky and back to Virgin again, all in the space of about a week, this problem has developed with sending emails.

At first when i switched from Virgin, I got a message that my NTL email address would no longer work after 90 days, as it was owned by Virgin. Each time I wanted to send from my NTL account I got a pop-up message asking me (Think I recall correctly) to insert my NTL password. I ignored it and switched my sending email address to my gmail email account. Now I find difficulty sending both in Gmail and in Virgin, sometimes having to wait several minutes for the email to go, sometimes it not going at all, other times waiting for a copy, then occasionally "can't copy to the "sent" folder so save in "Local Folder".

I would be grateful for advice how to revert to the previous excellent service i always had with Thunderbird.
creator: gramlagansingh

title: Thunderbird non scarica nuovi messaggi
content: Ho Thunderbird portable 128.5.1esr con diversi account di posta imap. Da qualche tempo quando apro Thunderbird inizialmente l'applicazione non riesce a scaricare nuovi messaggi, come potete vedere sull'immagine che allego del registro attività, e solo in un secondo tempo riesce a farlo. Per ovviare al momento ho impostato gli account a non controllare i nuovi messaggi all’avvio (deselezionandolo sulla scheda impostazione server), e solo dopo chiedo di scaricare i nuovi messaggi da tutti gli account. Precedentemente questo non avveniva e non riesco a ricordare dopo quale aggiornamento ha iniziato a verificarsi. In attesa di un vostro gentile consiglio, ringrazio e vi auguro buone prossime feste
creator: brusalbert

title: Native TB CardDav does not show contacts
content: CardDav is supported by TB now. I want to go away from the CardBook extension to native TB-CardDav. But: From 3 selected cardDAV-Addressbooks, only two synced and showed all contacts (150 and 700). The third (with 1300 contacts) will not show any contacts in TB. The address book is there, and contains the contacts. The address book did sync prior to the TB128-update with the CardBook TB-extension and does synch with other cardDAV apps like Davx5 on Android. Are there any limits for number of address books or number of contacts per address books in TB? Any other thoughts?
creator: gdernick

title: Thunderbird + Yubikey: console.warn: "EnigmailFuncs.sync() failed result: %o"
content:
Привет всем! Облазил и прочел много формумов, статей и так далее, для настройки работы Thunderbird с OpenPGP и с Yubikey. Все материалы утверждают что да, можно всё это настроить. Но, все предложенные варианты не помогают, всё равно вылетает вот такая ошибка, если Thunderbird запустить из терминала. У меня Ubuntu 24.04.1 и Thunderbird 128.1.0esr (64-разрядный).

console.warn: "EnigmailFuncs.sync() failed result: %o" (new TypeError("typedArray is null", "chrome://openpgp/content/modules/RNP.sys.mjs", 3749)) JavaScript error: chrome://openpgp/content/modules/mimeEncrypt.sys.mjs, line 455: Error: encryptMessageStart FAILED: -1 console.error: mailnews.send: ({}) console.error: mailnews.send: "Sending failed; , exitCode=2153185313, originalMsgURI=" JavaScript error: chrome://openpgp/content/modules/RNP.sys.mjs, line 3749: TypeError: typedArray is null

Вопрос, как всё это нормально настроить, что бы это работало?
creator: dev.sokolovsky

title: SETUP: Unable to login at server
content:
I have just installed Thunderbird. I've completed the Account Setup. The page checks the input and then return an error message saying: "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password".

The username and password are stored in Bitwarden [Password Manager] so are not wrong. In any case, I have the same email account open in a different browser demonstrating that I am using the right log-in name and password.

Knowing that the configuration is likely incorrect is no help. I have no idea what part of the configuration is incorrect. Guidance on what to change would be appreciated.

[Just in case the developers are reading, it would be really useful if paste was not disabled for the password field. Other browsers don't disable paste and I don't see why security requires it.]
creator: paulindr
